name: get_everything
description: Get news articles and blog posts based on a wide range of parameters

q.description: Keywords or phrases to search for

searchIn.description: Search within the title, body, or both

sources.description: A comma-separated string of identifiers for the news sources or blogs you want headlines from

domains.description: A comma-separated string of domains to restrict the search to

excludeDomains.description: A comma-separated string of domains to exclude from the search

from.description: A date and optional time for the oldest article allowed

to.description: A date and optional time for the newest article allowed

language.description: The language to restrict articles to

sortBy.description: The order to sort the articles in

pageSize.description: The number of results to return per page

name: get_top_headlines
description: Get top headlines from a specific country, category, source, or based on a keyword

country.description: The country to restrict articles to

category.description: The category to restrict articles to

sources.description: A comma-separated string of identifiers for the news sources or blogs you want headlines from

q.description: Keywords or phrases to search for in the article title and body

pageSize.description: The number of results to return per page

name: get_sources
description: Get details about all the sources or just the ones that match the specified criteria

category.description: Find sources that are classified as a specific category

language.description: Find sources that write in a specific language

country.description: Find sources from a specific country
